vote.title: Authorize (1) the transfer of funds in an amount not to exceed $1,558,434.00 from the General Fund to the Dallas Streetcar System Fund to support the operation and maintenance of the Dallas Streetcar for Fiscal Year (FY) 2023; (2) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $1,558,434.00 in the Dallas Streetcar System Fund; and (3) payment to Dallas Area Rapid Transit for operation and maintenance costs for the Dallas Streetcar System from Union Station to Bishop Arts District for FY 2023 - Not to exceed $1,858,434.00 - Financing: General Fund ($1,558,434.00) and Streetcar Developer Fund ($300,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize (1) the transfer of funds in an amount not to exceed $1,558,434.00 from the General Fund to the Dallas Streetcar System Fund to support the operation and maintenance of the Dallas Streetcar for Fiscal Year (FY) 2023; (2) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $1,558,434.00 in the Dallas Streetcar System Fund; and (3) payment to Dallas Area Rapid Transit for operation and maintenance costs for the Dallas Streetcar System from Union Station to Bishop Arts District for FY 2023 - Not to exceed $1,858,434.00 - Financing: General Fund ($1,558,434.00) and Streetcar Developer Fund ($300,000.00)
